title: Historical warming reduced due to enhanced land carbon uptake
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
contributionStatement: Conducted the GFDL Earth System Model version "2G" (GFDL-ESM2G) simulations used in this study and performed analysis of global mean surface air temperature response to different land use and CO2 fertilization conditions (D=80\% / I=20\% / W=15\%)
